head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths CALLANAN, PHYLLIS THERESA

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths CALLANAN, PHYLLIS THERESA

block.p: CALLANAN-Phyllis Theresa. Of Southold, NY formerly of NY City on July 27, 2000. Devoted sister of Carol Wise. Cherished aunt of four nieces and two nephews. Also survived by twelve grand nieces and nephews. Visiting hours today 2-4 P.M. at DeFriest Funeral Home, Southold, NY. Mass of Christian Burial Sat. 8:45 A.M., St. Patrick's R.C. Church, Southold. Interment Calvary Cemetery, Woodside, NY.
